name: express-director
description: A file system based router for express that eases standardizing controller handling

scripts.test:cjs: npm --prefix test/cjs-app install && npm --prefix test/cjs-app run test
scripts.test:mjs: npm --prefix test/mjs-app install && npm --prefix test/mjs-app run test
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:mjs && npm run test:cjs
